name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForAutomaticImplantableCardioverterDefibrillatorProcedures
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Automatic Implantable Cardioverter/Defibrillator Procedures
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to cardioverter-defibrillator procedures.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes insertion and replacement of cardioverter-defibrillator components.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes removal without replacement procedures.)
